name: Holiday Protocol 2
description:
Do you like Christmas gifts?

You've been a good boy. Way too good.

Holiday Protocol 2 is the sequel of Holiday Protocol, a physics-based space management game in which you'll have so many gifts that you will not be able to process so many gifts and throwing them out the window it is a good solution.

Catch the gifts that fall down the chimney using your mouse to stack gifts until you have a chance to throw them out the window or give them to other children. Be careful not to block the chimney or you will lose!

New features!!

- New and amazing original audio implemented, OST & SFX.

- Full Screen available, bye bye low resolution.

- Wonderful Pause Menu, to rest your hand.

AUTHORS

Adrián Torres Fernández

David Arona Bueno

AUDIO
